alert.note: Alert for Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:48PM CDT until June 11 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RANDALL AND EAST CENTRAL DEAF SMITH COUNTIES... At 748 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Buffalo Lake, or 13 miles southwest of Canyon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Dawn, Umbarger and Buffalo Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
